name: 劉英彥
objective:
課程將習得電腦 2D 影像編輯及繪圖軟體在視覺設計、產品與空間設計領域的多元表現技能。
以 photoshop 為主要表現工具，實現電腦視覺輔助設計在概念溝通、圖像表達、造型發展、情境表現的設計應用力。

The course will lead students to acquire the multi-expression application skills of computer 2D image editing and drawing software in the fields of visual communication, product and space design.

Using Photoshop as the main expression software tool, realize the design application force of computer vision-aided design in concept communication, image expression, modeling development, and situational expression.
schedule:
課程進度：週次 / 單元主題 *

1. 預備週：課程簡介；軟體設置
2. 視覺設計概念與型態；軟體介面導覽
3. 視覺的共感 - 廣告思維
4. 意象表現技法
5. 圖像設計技法
6. 訊息編排技法
7. 期中作業 - 題目探索 
8. 期中作業 - 規劃與協作
9. 期中作業發表
10. 作業解析
11 產品之視覺設計應用
12. 型態與形體
13. 色彩與材質
14. 圖形與介面
15. 情境和場域
16. 期末題目探索與規劃
17. 期末作業製作與討論
18. 期末作品發表

＊每週的課程進度，將依據學生的學習狀態，做適度的調控

Course Progress: Weeks/Unit Topics*

1. Preparatory week: course introduction; software setting
2. Visual design concept and form; software interface guide
3. Visual sympathetic communication : advertising design thinking
4. Image Expression Techniques
5. Graphic Design Techniques
6. Message Arrangement Techniques
7. Mid-term assignment - topic exploration
8. Midterm assignments - planning and collaboration
9. Publishing midterm assignments
10. Publishing result Analysis
11 Visual design application of products
12. Form and physical manifestation
13. Color and material performance
14. Pattern and interface performance
15. Situational and Field Performance
16. Image planning for the final work topic
17. Final work making and discussion
18. Publication of final works

＊The weekly course progress will be moderately regulated according to the actual learning status of the students
